blog.name: metradell-vyorei
blog.title: Gravy King
blog.description: I am Quinn. I am 24, Irish, in a relationship. I am queer, I am nonbinary, and I am disabled. My best friend is a chihuahua called Magical Harper. If you're under 18 you should get off my blog, stuff gets Adult in here. I really love plants. Proud Heathen. Folkish can fuck off. We love and respect women and minorities in this house of all backgrounds, ethnicities and histories.      I swear a fucking lot. But talk to me, I like making friends.

summary:
OK so I had an idea for an OC BNHA character
Their Quirk is an unmanageable one, they can manipulate people through telepathy...
body:
OK so I had an idea for an OC BNHA character

Their Quirk is an unmanageable one, they can manipulate people through telepathy via whatever music they hear, but they can’t control what different music causes so they wear special hearing aids that act as a blocking signal, because Every OC gets what I call a flux capacitor (an object that is just accepted and not questioned to deeply beyond asking what it does rather than how), the earbuds distort music but allow them to hear words.

With training they can learn to increase the radius of people affected and single in on a target, with specialised playlists of music that boost their team’s morale, hope, anger, energy

I can imagine the kids playing with this on times in the dorm when they decide to take the hearing aids out

Everyone watching vines with them due to the rapid changes in music to see what they do

Sometimes of course this leads to accidents, like walls cracking and everyone kung foo fighting

title: I’m so, so fucking sorry.
body:
Title: I’m so, so fucking sorry.

Word-count: 777 words

Genre: Angst

Pairing: KiriBaku (Kirishima Eijirou x Bakugo Katsuki)

Warnings: Major Character Death, Blood, Violence, Emotional Pain

~~~

Katsuki didn’t know what happened, but at one point there was just chaos. A whole riot took place around him and he couldn’t move a single muscle. Everything hurt, his mind was screaming, but his body didn’t take any orders. He was frozen in place while his friends, his partner, were fighting at their hardest.

Just moments ago he was fighting among them, defending the school and the already hurt people around him, but at his only moment of negligence -

All he felt was pain. A sharp pain that made everything blurry; that made everything seem so unreal. And he stopped dead in his tracks, not being able to move. The pain was overwhelming, clouding his mind and he didn’t know what was happening. He couldn’t even pinpoint the location where he was hit; it hurt fucking everywhere!

Being a hero meant to put his life on the line, but how could he die, when he didn’t save anyone yet? He was supposed to be a hero! Not some weakling who would cry out because of pain, who’d stop fighting because he hurt! But he still couldn’t move. He still couldn’t step forward, activate his quirk and fucking blew everyone up that wanted to hurt his friends!!

And that was, when he saw Eijirou. His partner, his love! Fighting like there was no tomorrow; fighting to protect everything they stood for. Katsuki just wanted to help. Why couldn’t he move? Why couldn’t he fight?!

With everything that was left in him, he took one step forward, only one motivation clear on his mind: protect. He needed to fight. Everything after that didn’t matter. But they needed him now.

So he fought. With teeth and claws and fire. His quirk going rampage and even though it blasted the skin off of his already bruised hands, he kept fighting. This was a fight he needed to win. Slow but steady he knocked out villain after villain, getting closer to Eijirou who himself was engaged in a battle, not seeing Shigaraki appearing behind him. As great and impressive Eijirous’ hardening quirk was, it was nothing against the quirk of that motherfucker!

So Katsuki leapt between them, an outraged cry on his lips and the last thing he saw, Eijirous’ shocked expression, clear on his mind.

Then, everything went black, and he could finally pinpoint where the pain was coming from…

~~~

The only thing Eijirou had eyes for, was his boyfriend. He was engaged in a battle, not noticing Shigaraki behind him - and when he turned around at an outraged scream, he already saw Katsukis’ stomach crumble to dust, Shigaraki already vanished in the crowd of the other fighters.

But Eijirou didn’t care. He fell on his knees, tears already pooling out of his eyes as he cradled Katsuki’s face in his hands, frantically whispering his name. Like a mantra he repeated his name, over and over again, like he could hear him.

It couldn’t be. No, please… Everyone, but not him! He was always so strong, keen to be the No. 1 Hero! And now he couldn’t even accomplish that… Katsuki couldn’t… no. No no no no no!

And even though he knew that, he looked so peaceful, almost happy, surrounded by the blood that gave such a huge contrast to his light skin. Eijirou’s tears fell on the face below him, dripping off Katsuki’s cheeks without a reaction. And even though his frantic whispering turned into uncontrolled sobs and shouting Katsuki didn’t move a muscle.

The red-haired hero couldn’t believe what just happened - he wouldn’t! How could he? How could he accept that his love would jump infront of hi- it was his fault. The revelation was like a punch in the face and he stared into the nothingness for a few moments, just before the guilt kicked in. And the tears found no end. His love was was dying, and it was his fault. Because he was too stupid, too self-absorbed, too reckless. He had to be saved by someone else, even though it was his fucking job to save others…

And when Eijirou acknowledged, that his boyfriend wasn’t even breathing anymore, only one thing was left on his mind:

‘I’m sorry. I’m so, so fucking sorry. I couldn’t save you. Again.’
body_abstract:
Title: I’m so, so fucking sorry.

Word-count: 777 words

Genre: Angst

Pairing: KiriBaku (Kirishima Eijirou x Bakugo Katsuki)

Warnings: Major Character Death, Blood, Violence, Emotional Pain

~~~

[Captain Squirrel] [INFP] [Bookworm] [24] 
Yo, Nikky here~ 
Just a writer that has too many feelings about fictional characters and the occassional world problems. Is also in the middle of trying to figure out how to adult. Sometimes she draws too.

tags: graphics are so fun to make not gonna lie
medibang offers so many fonts that I'm planning to make several for my fic updates
summary: For the past months, I had the pleasure of working with the folks over at Astraeus, the @thebnhaspacezine It has been a blast...
caption:
For the past months, I had the pleasure of working with the folks over at Astraeus, the @thebnhaspacezine It has been a blast writing sci-fi, especially when it boiled down to mecha suits and outer space!! ♥ ♥ ♥

Here’s a little snippet from my piece~ ^w^ 

Everyone has worked so hard and all the pieces are just breathtaking! Preorders close on May 13th, so don’t miss your chance to grab a copy here!!

summary: pink cheeks, calloused hands, small wonders - Chapter 1 - TheGodWith5Yen - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero...
title: pink cheeks, calloused hands, small wonders - Chapter 1 - TheGodWith5Yen - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Hi I couldn’t remember if I posted this here so- check out my kaccako fic its cute and fun!

Her hands found his. She breathed out. Her breath smelled like Listerine, it made Katsuki wrinkle his nose at her.

“I’m pregnant.”

Katsuki’s eyes widened and he stared at her, his mouth opening. “Oh shit. Shit, whoa, okay, wow.” His hands unclasped from hers and traveled down to her stomach. “Ochako, wow.” Not even an hour ago he was convinced his girlfriend was breaking up with him. His mind couldn’t completely wrap around what was happening, but he couldn’t stop looking at his girlfriend in awe. He kissed her forehead, a smacking kiss with a “mwah” sound that had Ochako rolling her eyes and cuddling closer to him. “You’re pregnant.”

“I am.” Ochako agreed, her voice steady and confidant.

Katsuki licked his dry lips. His mind was racing. “Cool.”

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Bakugou Mitsuki, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Masaru Warnings: Violence,...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Bakugou Mitsuki, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Masaru
Warnings: Violence, Betrayal

Prompt: Mitsuki was jealous of Inko for having such a sweet child. She stages an incident that leaves Inko in a coma and they adopt Izuku in the meantime. And then the kids turn 4.

- kunnskat on AO3
